Verses: 1 appozhudhu Dhevanudaiya Aavi Odhedhin Kumaaranaagiya Asariyaavinmel Iranginadhinaal,

2 avan Veliye Aasaavukku Edhirkondupoi, Avanai Nokki: Aasaave, Yoodhaa Benyameen Koththirangalin Sagala Manushare, Kelungal; Neengalkarththarodirundhaal, Avar Ungalodiruppaar; Neengal Avaraith Thedinaal, Ungalukku Velippaduvaar; Avarai Vitteergaleyaagil, Avar Ungalai Vittuviduvaar.
3 isravelile Anega Naalaai Meyyaana Dhevanum Illai, Ubadhesikkira Aasaariyanum Illai, Vedhamum Illai.
4 thangal Nerukkaththile Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththaridaththukkuth Thirumbi, Avaraith Thedinapodhu, Avar Avargalukku Velippattaar.
5 akkaalangalile Veliye Pogiravargalukkum Ulle Varugiravargalukkum Samaadhaanam Illai; Dhesangalin Kudigalellaarukkullum Magaa Amali Undaayirundhu,
6 jaadhiyai Jaadhiyum, Pattanaththaip Pattanamum Norukkinadhu; Dhevan Avargalai Sagalavidha Idukkaththinaalum Kalangappanninaar.
7 neengalo Ungal Kaigalai Negizhavidaamal Thidankollungal; Ungal Kiriyaigalukku Balan Undu Endraan.

8 aasaa Indha Vaarththaigalaiyum Theerkkadharisiyaagiya Odhedhin Theerkkadharisanaththaiyum Kettapodhu, Avan Thidankondu, Aruvaruppugalai Yoodhaa Benyameen Dhesam Anaiththilum, Eppiraayeemin Malaiththesaththil Thaan Pidiththa Pattanangalilumirundhu Agatri, Karththarudaiya Mandabaththin Munnirukkira Karththarudaiyapalipeedaththaip Pudhuppiththu,

9 avan Yoodhaa Benyameen Janangalaiyum, Avargalodekooda Eppiraayeemilum Manaaseyilum Simiyonilum Irundhu Vandhu Avargalodu Sanjariththavargalaiyum Koottinaan; Avanudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththar Avanodirukkiradhaik Kandu, Isravelilirundhu Thiralaana Janangal Avan Patchaththil Serndhaargal.
10 aasaa Arasaanda Padhinaindhaam Varusham Moondraam Maadhaththile Avargal Erusalemile Koodi,
11 thaangal Kollaiyittu Ottikkonduvandhavaigalil Annaalile Ezhunooru Maadugalaiyum Ezhaayiram Aadugalaiyum Karththarukkup Paliyittu,
12 thangal Pidhaakkalin Dhevanaagiya Karththaraith Thangal Muzhu Irudhayaththodum Thangal Muzhu Aaththumaavodum Theduvom Endrum;
13 siriyor Periyor Sthree Purusharellaarilum, Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththaraith Thedaadhavan Evano Avan Kolaiseyyappadavendum Endrum Oru Udanpadikkai Seydhu,
14 magaa Saththaththodum Gembeeraththodum Poorigaigalodum Ekkaalangalodum Karththarukku Munbaaga Aanaiyittaargal.

15 indha Aanaikkaaga Yoodhaa Janangal Yaavarum Sandhoshappattaargal, Thangal Muzhu Irudhayaththodum Aanaiyittu, Thangal Muzhumanadhodum Avaraith Thedinaargal; Karththar Avargalukku Velippattu, Sutruppuraththaaraal Yuththamillaadhapadikku Avargalai Ilaippaarappanninaar.

16 thoppile Aruvaruppaana Vikkiragaththai Undupannina Raajaavaagiya Aasaavin Thaayaana Maagaalaiyum Raajaaththiyaai Iraadhapadikku Aasaa Vilakkippottu, Avaludaiya Vikkiragaththaiyum Nirmoolamaakkith Thagarththu, Keedharon Aarandaiyile Sutteriththuppottaan.
17 medaigalo Isravelilirundhu Thagarkkappadavillai; Aanaalum, Aasaavinin Irudhayam Avan Naatkalilellaam Uththamamaayirundhadhu.
18 than Thagappanum Thaanum Parisuththampannumpadi Nerndhukonda Velliyaiyum Ponnaiyum Panimuttugalaiyum Avan Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththile Konduvandhaan.
19 aasaa Arasaanda Muppaththaindhaam Varushamattum Yuththam Illaadhirundhadhu.
